title: Episode 177: Pep Talks with Jasmine Guillory
itunes:title: Episode 177: Pep Talks with Jasmine Guillory
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree are joined by Jasmine Guillory — longtime friend of the pod and NY Times bestselling author — whose new novel, While We Were Dating, is out on July 13th. They talk about why her meal prepping looks so effortless, her writing pro...
description:
Kate and Doree are joined by Jasmine Guillory — longtime friend of the pod and NY Times bestselling author — whose new novel, While We Were Dating, is out on July 13th. They talk about why her meal prepping looks so effortless, her writing process, what her pre-zoom glam routine is, and the specifics of how she juggled writing with a full-time job.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
